verses.verse: כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki When יְרַחֵ֨ם <WH7355> ye-ra-Chem will have mercy יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, on Jacob וּבָחַ֥ר <WH977> u-va-Char and will yet choose עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od and again בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, Israel וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <WH3240> ve-hin-ni-Cham and set עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- their own אַדְמָתָ֑ם <WH127> 'ad-ma-Tam; them in their own land וְנִלְוָ֤ה <WH3867> ve-nil-Vah shall be joined הַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> hag-Ger and the strangers עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, and וְנִסְפְּח֖וּ <WH5596> ve-nis-pe-Chu with them and they shall cleave עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit to the house יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

הוּרַ֥ד <WH3381> hu-Rad is brought down שְׁא֛וֹל <WH7585> she-'ol to the grave גְּאוֹנֶ֖ךָ <WH1347> ge-'o-Ne-cha Thy pomp הֶמְיַ֣ת <WH1998> hem-Yat [and] the noise נְבָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5035> ne-va-Lei-cha; of thy viols תַּחְתֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH8478> tach-Tei-cha beneath יֻצַּ֣ע <WH3331> yutz-Tza' is spread רִמָּ֔ה <WH7415> rim-Mah, the worm וּמְכַסֶּ֖יךָ <WH4374> u-me-chas-Sei-cha cover תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <WH8438> to-le-'Ah. under thee and the worms
